name: Hokkaido Haul
description:
Hokkaido Haul!

Help the van gang make it to the end of the treacherous Hokkaido cycle! Bop bears and avoid drones while searching for root beer to give you the energy to give a rousing pep talk! Fill up your HYPE meter to gain more $$$ every 100kms!

Keyboard Controls:
WASD = movement
Down = crouch in van
space = jump

Gamepad:

D-PAD Left/Right = movement
D-PAD Down = crouch in van
Jump=A button

NOTE: Click game window to enable sound on browser
